meta_title: Orfina Porsche Design Chronograph Ref. 7750 – Dial Design & Features
meta_description: Explore the detailed dial of the Orfina Porsche Design Chronograph Ref. 7750, featuring a matte black background, white luminous markers, day-date complication, and Porsche-inspired tachymeter layout. Iconic design used in the original Top Gun watch with Valjoux 7750 movement.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7750 dial, Porsche Design Chronograph 1 dial layout, Valjoux 7750 day date dial, Top Gun watch dial, Porsche speedometer tachymeter dial, black matte dial watch, 1970s Porsche Design dial details
overview: There are two dial variations found on the Reference 7750.

variations.title: Orfina Dial
variations.note: Found On: Mk. 1 Case with Mk. 1 caseback

bulletSection.title: Description:
text: The First is the Orfina Dial, the dial that started it all. “ORFINA” is printed above the Day/Date windows, and “PORSCHE DESIGN” is printed below the windows.
It is solely found on the Mk. 1 Case with a Mk. 1 Caseback and either rehaut.

variations.title: PD Dial
variations.note: Found On: All case marks and Mk. 2 caseback

bulletSection.title: Description:
text: “PD” is printed above the Day/Date windows and “PORSCHE DESIGN” is printed below the windows.
This dial can be found on any 7750 case, caseback or rehaut variation except for the original Mk. 1 Caseback found exclusively paired with an Orfina dial.
